DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFVAG202 Past 30 Days How Much Vaginal Discomfort During Sexual Activity Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how much discomfort was felt inside their vagina when they have had sexual activity, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days How Much Vaginal Discomfort During Sexual Activity Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how much vaginal discomfort an individual felt during sexual activity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from 1 (None) to 5 (A lot).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened a lot of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened a lot of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At least a small amount or number of, but not a large amount of, or often.

Concepts.definition: At least a small amount or number of, but not a large amount of, or often.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened a little of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened a little of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
